name: nimbus/hector-mapping-hd
description:
2D laser scan mapping using Hector mapping algorithm (high resolution map)
git: https://github.com/cognimbus/nimbus.library/tree/master/Library/Components/hector-mapping/hector-mapping-hd
License: BSD

parameters.name: map_multi_res_levels
parameters.description: The number of map multi-resolution grid levels.

parameters.name: scan_subscriber_queue_size
parameters.description: The queue size of the scan subscriber. This should be set to high values (for example 50) if logfiles are played back to hector_mapping at faster than realtime speeds.

parameters.name: map_frame
parameters.description: The name of the map frame.

parameters.name: scan_topic
parameters.description: The name of the topic that will publish the lazer scan.

parameters.name: output
parameters.description: Prints output, the value can be screen or log

parameters.name: use_tf_scan_transformation
parameters.description: Whether to transform the scan with the tf attached to the scan message

parameters.name: tf_map_scanmatch_transform_frame_name
parameters.description: The frame name when publishing the scanmatcher to map transform as described in the preceding parameter.

parameters.name: map_resolution
parameters.description: The map resolution [m]. This is the length of a grid cell edge.

parameters.name: map_size
parameters.description: The size [number of cells per axis] of the map. The map is square and has (map_size * map_size) grid cells.

parameters.name: map_start_x
parameters.description: Location of the origin [0.0, 1.0] of the /map frame on the x axis relative to the grid map. 0.5 is in the middle.

parameters.name: map_start_y
parameters.description: Location of the origin [0.0, 1.0] of the /map frame on the y axis relative to the grid map. 0.5 is in the middle.

parameters.name: max_translation
parameters.description: The max translation is the maximum vector that is represented by tf::Vector3, which is equivalent to btVector3.

parameters.name: map_frame
parameters.description: The name of the map frame.

parameters.name: base_frame
parameters.description: The name of the base frame of the robot. This is the frame used for localization and for transformation of laser scan data.

inputStreams.name: scan
inputStreams.description: The laser scan used by the SLAM system.

outputStreams.name: map
outputStreams.description: Get the map data from this topic, which is latched, and updated periodically.

outputStreams.name: pose_stamped
outputStreams.description: The estimated robot pose without covariance.
